Php 5,950.00

Simplicity somestimes make things best! Widget City offers you a budget friendly smartphones that combines basic features and android experience that surely won't drop your pants off on the price!

Htc Explorer offers fairly great 3.2 MP camera pack within, a 3.5 HTC sense with expandable up to 32GB memory card slot for only P6,400! Get this exclusive offer only at Widget City!
